keyFacts: The invoice details multiple shipments made by Epstein & Co Inc between July 27 and August 2, 1999.
Total charges for the invoice amount to $263.92.
Shipments were sent to various recipients including Peg Uglan and Gerald Edelman.
The document includes specific details about the weight and type of packages sent.
Several individuals are listed as senders, indicating a network of staff involved in the operations of Epstein & Co Inc.
